Sentence.sentence: Less than an hour away by snowmobile, Chinese labourers have updated the Great Wall Station, a vital part of China's plan to operate five bases on Antarctica, complete with an indoor badminton court and sleeping quarters for 150 people.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: China's newly renovated Great Wall Station on King George Island makes the Russian and Chilean bases here seem outdated.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And there is more to the story, because not only are the devices that house incandescent bulbs shaped to their underlying characteristics, but rooms and entire buildings have been designed in accordance with how incandescent lighting reflects off walls and windows.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: By last year, Wall Street traders, bankers and those who deal in real estate generated 21% of the national income, double their share in the 1950s.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Newspapers relay daily accounts of goal-setting prevalent in industries and businesses up and down both Wall Street and Main Street , yet there has been surprisingly little research on how the long-trumpeted practice of setting goals may have contributed to the current economic crisis , and unethical （不道德的）behavior in general.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: There aren't many jobs in science for them, so they go to Wall Street and Silicon Valley to apply their analytical skills to more practical—and rewarding—efforts.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It takes a certain type of person who will bang his head against the wall because you believe you'll find the solution.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: China's newly renovated Great Wall Station on king George Island makes the Russian and Chilean bases here seem outdated.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Subjects played a computerized driving game in which the player must avoid crashing into a wall that materializes, without warning, on the roadway.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题(第二套)阅读 Section B

list.explanation: (由于失望、 焦急或忧虑而)举止失常

example.en: By the time the cops came I was about to climb the wall.
example.zh: 警察赶到的时候，我都快急得发疯了。

example.en: He was at home for only three days, then he began to go up the wall.
example.zh: 他在家里只呆了三天，后来就开始坐立不安了。
他出来了。越狱逃出来的。

example.en: At least,I don't know anybody who is up the wall about it.
example.zh: 至少我就不知道有谁在为此发疯。

list.explanation: 忧虑的，发愁的，心绪不好的

example.en: He' s really up the wall about Mary's illness.
example.zh: 他的确很为玛丽的病担忧。

word_mean: 壁：某个局限的空间，如胸腔、腹腔或中空的器官的限制性结构。各种解剖结构的特化壁的正式名称见paries项下
直接进行采掘的煤层暴露面。

Sentence.sentence: All through the night, Alia, Anis, his brothers and neighbours took the books from the library, passed them over the seven-foot wall and hid them in the restaurant.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Another important design goal is communication, which designers have improved by lowering the walls that separate workstations.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 选词填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: As natural architects, the pueblo Indians figured out exactly how thick the adobe walls needed to be to make the cycle work on most days.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Dreaming about whether you would want to read minds, see through walls, or have superhuman strength may sound silly, but it actually gets to the heart of what really matters in your life.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: He asked the workers to use traditional techniques to make the bricks into walls, roofs and corridors.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: If you studied pictures that ancient people left on rock walls and you tried to determine their meaning, you would not detect a deep interest in romance among the artists.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: It's cleaner, there are benches to sit on, and there are the arts on the walls.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Since finishing my studies at harvard and oxford, I've watched one friend after another land high-ranking, high-paying wall street jobs.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The large color decision in your rooms concern the walls, ceilings, and floors.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: The photo on the bedroom wall enables the author to better understand the shared passion for beauty.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 题设

Sentence.sentence: This cycle goes day after day: the walls warm up during the day and cool off during the night and are thus always a timely offset for the outside temperatures.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: This photo, with the unique beauty that unfolded before me and that woman who "ruined" it, now hangs on a wall in my bedroom.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Walls made of adobe take in the heat from the sun on hot days and give out that heat slowly during cool nights, thus warming the house.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: We shared the brief that if you're fortunate enough to have success, you should put something back - he with his newman's own food and his hole in the wall camps for kids who are seriously ill, and me with sundance and the institute and the festival.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: When a new day breaks, the walls have given up their heat and are now cold enough to cool the house during the hot day; at the same time, they warm up again for the night.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Similarly, some Wall Street investment films armed themselves with patents for financial products, even as they took positions in court cases opposing the practice.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: So, does the Spanish crisis suggest that monarchy is seeing its last days? Does that mean the writing is on the wall for all European royals, with their magnificent uniforms and majestic lifestyle?.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The Navy Department moved into the east wing in 1879, where elaborate wall and ceiling stenciling and marquetry floors decorated the office of the Secretary.
Sentence.come: 出自-2018年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Many of the most celebrated national figures have participated in historical events that have taken place within the EEOB's granite walls.
Sentence.come: 出自-2018年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Completed in 1875, the State Department's south wing was the first to be occupied, with its elegant four-story library ( ' , completed in 1876), Diplomatic Reception Room, and Secretary's office decorated with carved wood, Oriental rugs, and stenciled wall patterns.
Sentence.come: 出自-2018年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: As the auctioneer called out bids, in New York one of the oldest banks on Wall Street, Lehman Brothers, filed for bankruptcy.
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Completed in 1875, the State Department's south wing was the first to be occupied, with its elegant four-story library, diplomatic Reception Room, and Secretary's office decorated with carved wood, Oriental rugs, and stenciled wall patterns.
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: In its latest survey of CEO pay, The Wall Street Journal finds that "a substantial part" of executive pay is now tied to performance.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: similarly, some Wall Street investment firms armed themselves with patents for financial products, even as they took positions in court cases opposing the practice.
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

sentences.en: They glided along the wall until they were out of sight.
sentences.cn: 他们沿着墙壁溜得无影无踪。

sentences.en: He fastened the calendar to a wall.
sentences.cn: 他把日历挂在墙上。

sentences.en: I should hate to be confined within the four walls of an office all day.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌整天关在办公室里。

means.word_mean: （身体器官或动植物细胞等的）外壁
筑墙围住, 用墙隔开

sentences.en: We're going to wall the garden.
sentences.cn: 我们打算用墙把花园围起来。

sentences.en: They walled off the large prison into lots of very small cells.
sentences.cn: 他们把大监狱隔成很多小牢房。</seg>

phrase.cizu_name: between you and me and the wall
go to the wall informal 非正式

jx.jx_en_mean: (of a business) fail; go out of business
support someone or something, no matter what the cost to oneself

lj.lj_ly: the tendency for poets to &B{go to the wall for} their beliefs.
lj.lj_ls: 诗人们为了他们的信仰而不惜一切代价的倾向。

jx.jx_en_mean: (of an athlete) experience a sudden loss of energy in a long race

phrase.cizu_name: off the wall N. Amer. informal 北美，非正式

lj.lj_ly: the president was off the wall about the article.
lj.lj_ls: 总统对那篇文章十分气愤。

jx.jx_en_mean: (of an accusation) without basis or foundation
(proverb)be careful what you say as people may be eavesdropping
(of a carpet or other floor covering) fitted to cover an entire floor
jx.jx_cn_mean: （地毯或其他铺地材料）铺满整个地板的

lj.lj_ly: an accusation that is really off the wall.

jx.jx_en_mean: Into a state of extreme frustration, anger, or distress
jx.jx_cn_mean: 狂怒恼火的：进入极端沮丧、愤怒或悲哀的状态

lj.lj_ly: tensions that are driving me up the wall.

phrase.cizu_name: writing on the wall 或 handwriting on the wall

jx.jx_en_mean: An ominous indication of the course of future events
jx.jx_cn_mean: 凶兆：对于未来事件发展的不祥预示

lj.lj_ly: saw the writing on the wall and fled the country.
lj.lj_ls: 觉察到凶兆立即逃到了国外

entry.def: A wall is one of the vertical sides of a building or room.

example.ex: Kathryn leaned against the wall of the church...
example.tran: 凯瑟琳倚靠在教堂的墙上。

example.ex: The bedroom walls would be painted light blue...
example.tran: 卧室的墙壁会被漆成浅蓝色。

entry.def: A wall is a long narrow vertical structure made of stone or brick that surrounds or divides an area of land.

example.ex: He sat on the wall in the sun...
The well is surrounded by a wall only 12 inches high.

entry.def: The wall of something that is hollow is its side.

example.ex: He ran his fingers along the inside walls of the box.
example.tran: 他用手指摸了摸盒子的内壁。

entry.def: A wall of something is a large amount of it forming a high vertical barrier.
entry.tran: 屏障;堆成墙的大量物品

example.ex: She gazed at the wall of books...
example.tran: 她目不转睛地盯着书墙。

example.ex: I was just hit by a wall of water.

entry.def: You can describe something as a wall of a particular kind when it acts as a barrier and prevents people from understanding something.

example.ex: The police say they met the usual wall of silence...
example.tran: 警方称他们像往常一样碰了壁，没人吭气。

example.ex: Despite its prevalence, schizophrenia has existed behind a wall of secrecy for years.
example.tran: 尽管精神分裂症患者为数众多，但多年来这种病一直被捂着掩着。

entry.def: If you say that you are banging your head against a wall, you are emphasizing that you are frustrated because someone is stopping you from making progress in something.

example.ex: I appealed for help but felt I was always banging my head against a wall...
example.tran: 我寻求帮助，却发现自己处处碰壁。

example.ex: I wondered if I was banging my head against a brick wall.
example.tran: 我怀疑自己是不是在把鸡蛋往石头上碰，徒劳无益。

entry.def: If you have your back to the wall, you are in a very difficult situation and can see no way out of it.
entry.tran: 处于困境（或绝境);走投无路

example.ex: Their threat to hire replacement workers has the union with its back to the wall.
example.tran: 他们威胁说要雇用替工，这使工会陷入了困境。

entry.def: If you say that you are climbing the walls, you are emphasizing that you feel very frustrated, nervous, or anxious.

example.ex: Sitting at home would only have had him climbing the walls with frustration.
example.tran: 呆在家里只会让他沮丧得抓狂。

entry.def: If you say that something or someone is driving you up the wall, you are emphasizing that they annoy and irritate you.
entry.tran: 把…逼得发疯；逼得…受不了

example.ex: The heat is driving me up the wall...
I sang in the bath and drove my parents up the wall.
example.tran: 我在浴室里唱歌，我父母快受不了了。

entry.def: If a person or company goes to the wall, they lose all their money and their business fails.

example.ex: Even quite big companies are going to the wall these days.
example.tran: 现如今甚至有些大公司也濒临破产。

means.word_mean: 1. an architectural partition with a height and length greater than its thickness; used to divide or enclose an area or to support another structure;

sentences.sentence: "the south wall had a small window"

means.word_mean: 2. an embankment built around a space for defensive purposes;

sentences.sentence: "they stormed the ramparts of the city"
"they blew the trumpet and the walls came tumbling down"

means.word_mean: 3. anything that suggests a wall in structure or function or effect;
4. a masonry fence (as around an estate or garden);

sentences.sentence: "he ducked behind the garden wall and waited"

means.word_mean: 5. (anatomy) a layer (a lining or membrane) that encloses a structure;
6. a vertical (or almost vertical) smooth rock face (as of a cave or mountain)
7. a layer of material that encloses space;

sentences.sentence: "the walls of the cylinder were perforated"
"competition was pushing them to the wall"

means.word_mean: 1. surround with a wall in order to fortify

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, from Latin vallum 'rampart', from vallus 'stake'

sentences.cn: 这些喷射出的气流形成一道屏障,阻止空气从气箱逸出.
sentences.en: These air jets create a wall that keeps the air from escaping from the chamber.

sentences.cn: 修建这堵高墙作为屏障以防外人闯入.
sentences.en: The high wall was built as a defence against intruders.

sentences.cn: 这堵墙是入口的屏障.
sentences.en: The wall acts as a barrier to entry.

sentences.cn: 马塞尔.德塞利凭借自己强壮的身体和充沛的体能坐镇米兰中场, 形成一道不可逾越的坚实屏障!
sentences.en: Watching Marcello Desailly with his imposing built figure patrolling the midfield. Unpassable wall!

sentences.cn: 如果这些由树和其他植物形成的屏障能够挡住风的侵袭的话,那防护林就算起到了作用.
sentences.en: Windbreaks are effective when a wall of trees and other plants blocks the wind.

sentences.cn: 这座山高而陡,形成一道岩石屏障.
sentences.en: The mountain rise up in a steep wall of rock.

sentences.cn: 在打破互不信任的隔阂方面,我们已经迈出了第一步.
sentences.en: We had taken a first step in breaking down the walls of mistrust of each other.

sentences.cn: 然而,联邦政府在行业间制造隔阂的同时, 也就阻碍了对新领域的探索.
sentences.en: But when the federal government builds walls around industries, also blocks the exploration of new frontiers.

sentences.cn: 建立关税壁垒.
sentences.en: Erect a tariff wall.

sentences.cn: 经济全球化、贸易自由化的发展要求关税壁垒不断被拆除.
sentences.en: Economic globalization and trade liberalization call for an elimination of tariff wall.

sentences.cn: 巴西中产阶级第一轮井喷式大发展,发生在20世纪60年代,重重高关税壁垒后面.
sentences.en: The first big growth spurt took place in the 1960 s behind high tariff walls.

sentences.cn: 为正确理解技术性贸易壁垒的经济效应打下基础.
sentences.en: Be to understand that the technicality trade wall economy effect lays down basis correctly.

sentences.cn: 在四座刀一般壁垒那边,一种新生活模模糊糊地在等候着他.
sentences.en: Beyond four knifelike walls a new life for him waited vaguely.

sentences.cn: 政府决定提高关税壁垒以抵制外国货.
sentences.en: The government decided to raise tariff walls against foreign goods.

sentences.cn: 不过, 无论男女,一旦达到了肥胖的标准, 就都会遭遇职场壁垒.
sentences.en: Once either sex crosses the threshold into obesity, however, walls go up and women alike.

sentences.cn: WEEE更 象是关税壁垒, 犹如一堵无形的墙增加你的支出.
sentences.en: WEEE more like the tariff wall, the invisible wall to increase your cost.

sentences.cn: 但突破象牙塔的壁垒依然艰巨.
sentences.en: But the walls of the ivory tower remain formidable.

sentences.cn: 这就让我们见到关税壁垒的实质影响.
sentences.en: And this brings us to the real effect of a tariff wall.

sentences.cn: 所以,技术性贸易壁垒的对策研究事在必行.
sentences.en: So the study on the countermeasure for the technology trade wall should no doubt take all.

sentences.cn: 这所房子被高高的筑墙围住,受到很好的保护.
sentences.en: The house is well defended, surrounded by high walls.

sentences.en: They walled off part of the room.

sentences.en: The area has been partially walled off for use as storage.

sentences.cn: 侧巷和后花园之间用墙隔开了。
sentences.en: The side alley was walled off from the back garden.

sentences.en: The young man switched on the light at the wall socket.

sentences.cn: 墙壁的一部分坍塌了.

sentences.en: The paint has chipped off where the table touches the wall.

sentences.en: The figure stood on a shelf let into the study wall.

sentences.en: Thickness and strength of the walls could also be adapted to needs of each individual project.

sentences.en: Their pastels colored walls are topped with large rolls of barbed wire.

sentences.cn: 内部墙壁的楼梯间也被用同样均匀沉重的横梁所建造.
sentences.en: The interior walls of the stairwell are also constructed of the same uniformly heavy beams.

sentences.cn: 她又扔了一把坚果进去,听到它们撞击墙壁的声音.
sentences.en: She chucked in another handful of nuts and heard them rattling against the walls.

sentences.cn: 对抗墙壁的两者边站二张书桌, 每个用4个抽屉.
sentences.en: Against both sides of the wall stand two desks, each with 4 drawers.

sentences.cn: 在这面色彩明快的墙壁的衬托下,这幅画看上去很美.
sentences.en: The picture looks good when it is set against the light wall.

sentences.cn: 然后在墙壁的内外都刷上数层灰泥.
sentences.en: Next, he coats the walls and out with layers of clay plaster.

sentences.cn: 墙壁的表面很粗糙.
sentences.en: The wall has a rough surface.

sentences.cn: 葛莱尼斯老头把椅子拖到靠墙壁的地方.
sentences.en: Old Grannis had drawn his chair close to the wall.

sentences.cn: 在墙壁的一面有个高达天花板的书架.
sentences.en: On one wall there is a bookcase that reaches to the ceiling.

sentences.cn: 地面上升起的湿气使墙壁的颜色变得很难看.
sentences.en: The damp rising from the ground caused the walls to stain badly.

sentences.cn: 克隆模拟市民和墙壁的秘笈已被禁用.
sentences.en: The clone cheat has been disabled on Sims and Walls.

sentences.cn: 此清洗器适合地毯 、 地板 、 桌面、墙壁的清洗.
sentences.en: Said washing device is suitable for washing the carpet, floor, tabletop and wall.

sentences.cn: 马克打开灯而且发现在墙壁的洞未受到干扰的.
sentences.en: Mark turned on the lights and found the hole in the wall undisturbed.

sentences.cn: 粉笔痕迹破坏墙壁的外观.
sentences.en: Chalk marks deface the wall of the house.

sentences.cn: 我公司开发了一种可以看穿墙壁的产品.
sentences.en: Our company developed a new product that allows people to see through walls.

sentences.cn: 对各种墙壁的喷洒消毒剂溶液不宜超过其吸液量.
sentences.en: To all sorts of wall spray disinfectant solution is unfavorable exceed its to absorb fluid amount.

sentences.cn: 与现有的石工墙壁的连接是重要的.
sentences.en: Connections to the existing masonry wall are critical.

Sentence.sentence: Office managers knock down walls to encourage team building.

Sentence.sentence: Imagine being able to remember every painting, on every wall, in every gallery space, between nearly 40 countries, he says.

Sentence.sentence: The overthrown giants of Wall Street took the biggest knock, with average pay cuts of 38% and median bonuses of zero.

Sentence.sentence: On the other hand,there have been hundreds of thefts and cases of deliberate damaging of public property, which usually involves breaking windows or lights or writing on walls.
